Class Seat

  • java.lang.Object
    • Seat

  • public class Seat
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains data structure of each seat in the flight

      • Seat

        public Seat(java.lang.String classType,
            java.lang.String seatNumber,
            java.lang.String seatPosition,
            boolean isAvailable,
            Passenger passenger)
        Full constructor
        Parameters:
        classType - class of seat expected (first or economy)
        seatNumber - seat name
        seatPosition - position of seat ([W]indow, [C]enter, [A]isle)
        isAvailable - availability of seat true if available
        passenger - passenger information
